title: Please Riot!
body:
My Client is not working! 

I have reinstalled 3 times, repatched, and repaired yet to no avail. 
Please help!!
{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} 

[](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=oMVBFJvPBKg&feature=youtu.be)[](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/4z5gmq/help_my_clients_fucked_please_help/?ref=share&ref_source=link)

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you run through the [Troubleshooting Connection Issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) support article for me and let me know if anything helps.

Sorry for the delayed response.
